version_description: The bug that made impossible to change the thickness of digits and other elements on some devices is fixed
Fixed the bug because of which paid functions didn’t work
Widgets, Fine tuning: Brightness, "What’s new" screen
Support quick actions from the Home screen, Integration with the Shortcuts app
Fixed one more bug that could cause the application to crash on some devices.
Partially fixed a bug that could cause time to freeze on a medium-sized widget on some devices.
Fixed incorrect work of widgets, due to which time could freeze on some devices. Thanks to everyone who helped diagnose the problem and gave me no rest until the error was fixed.

Added partial support for VoiceOver — a gesture-based screen reader. If VoiceOver is enabled on your device, then when you tap on the widget or touch the screen in the app, the system will say the current time and date.
Fixed a bug due to which Fine tuning and widget settings couldn’t open, as reported by some users.
